title: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
summary: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe[lower-alpha 1] (28 August 1749 â€“ 22 March 1832) was a German poet, playwright, novelist, scientist, statesman, theatre director, and critic.[3] His works include plays, poetry, literature, and aesthetic criticism as well as treatises on botany, anatomy, and colour. He is considered to be the greatest German literary figure of the modern era.[3]
